bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_azalea_tea: A sweet blooming brew that soothes you
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_black_tea: Black tea makes great rocket fuel.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_chocolate_mi: Not to be confused with hot cocoa.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_chorus_juice: It smells of a familiar place...
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_crimson_tea: A common refreshment enjoyed among piglin.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_dark_coffee: You might need a backup cup.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_fudge_sundae: This isn't fudge sundae, is it?
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_green_tea: A sweet earthly brew that soothes you.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_hot_cocoa: Not to be confused with chocolate milk.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_jasmine_tea: A calming brew that could put you to sleep.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_kelp_tea: I chose coral fans instead of normal coral for the recipe on purpose.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_mango_tea: A mango a day keeps the doctor away.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_melon_juice: A bitter brew that is great for a hot summer day.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_shroomlight_: A mixture of the Nether's delight!
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_sweet_berry_: At least you won't accidentally place this one.
bitter_brews.tooltip.cup_of_warped_tea: It reeks a horrible smell into the air.
bitter_brews.tooltip.soul_pepper: You might wanna bring a cup of milk.
death.attack.bitter_brews.coffee_bush: %1$s was tangled and pricked to death by coffee bush
death.attack.bitter_brews.coffee_bush.pl: %1$s was forced into a prickly death to a coffee bush by %2$s
death.attack.bitter_brews.soul_pepper.pl: %1$s failed the soul pepper challenge to %2$s
death.attack.bitter_brews.stove: %1$s learnt it wasn't a good idea to play on the stove top
death.attack.bitter_brews.stove.player: %1$s was cooked into a delicacy by %2$s
effect.tipsylib.caffeinated.description: Small increase to most major stats
effect.tipsylib.caffeine_crash.descripti: Small decrease to most major stats
